errors.EMAIL_USED: Email already used by other account
errors.PHONE_NUMBER_FORMAT: Phone number must be in international format (e.g., +628123456789, 08123456789)
errors.PASS_MIN_6: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.PASS_SHOULD_HAVE_UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.PASS_SHOULD_HAVE_LOWERCASE: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.PASS_SHOULD_HAVE_NUMBER: Password must contain at least one number
errors.PASS_SHOULD_HAVE_SPECIAL_CHAR: Password must contain at least one special character
